title: New patch for Alpha client wont download and install
body:
So I cant download the new patch for the alpha client.
It always get stuck at 44.5mb and just freezes

replies.body:
Would you be able to zip up your LeagueClient logs directory and send it to me through Google Drive?

It's located here: 
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\LeagueClient Logs
Ok, so maybe it inst a visual bug, because when I restarted the client again it needed to re-download the patch again.

Ok, so it seems like its a visual but where it just freezes but it still works in the background and updates. I just left it sitting there for a while and it eventually went to the login screen.

If you still want to look at the logs here they are
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0BxYRngWPcViYZE8zdzVDY1FmMFk?usp=sharing
im also having the same problem but it stops with 1 or 2 mb left {{item:3070}}
